players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night. Please vote Alice today to end the game."
Charlie: "Alice, claim your role. Diana, specify exactly what result you got and why you chose Alice. Everyone: don’t insta-vote—let’s hear both sides."
You: remained silent.

You: "A detective claiming instantly with no counterplay makes zero sense here. Diana’s pushing a quick elim on me right after a night kill is opportunistic. Charlie, ask why she picked me N1 over Bob/you and state her exact result."
Charlie: "Alice, full claim now. Diana, restate your exact result (“Alice is mafia” or “Alice is town”) and why you chose her N1. Also, who would you have pushed if Alice had flipped town?"

Diana: "Alice is mafia. My N1 result: 'Alice is the mafioso.' I chose her for being quiet pre-flip and best info hit; if she’d returned town, I’d have pushed you, Charlie, for hedging. Her silence, then deflection, fits caught scum—please vote Alice."
